hints.content:
$\pink3\blue9$ is $\pink3$ tens and $\blue9$ ones.

$\pink9\blue3$ is $\pink9$ tens and $\blue3$ ones.

$\pink9$ tens is more than $\pink3$ tens.

$93$ is more than $39$.

You count more stars on Sunday.

choices.content: You count the same number of stars on Saturday and Sunday.

question.content:
On Saturday, you count $39$ stars.  
On Sunday, you count $93$ stars.  

**On which day did you count more stars?**
